scripts.start: until node src/index.js 2> src/front/logs/err.log 1> src/front/logs/out.log; do echo "WebDB crashed with exit code $?. Respawning..." >&2; sleep 1; done
scripts.obfuscate: javascript-obfuscator ./src --options-preset low-obfuscation && cd src && find . -name '*js' -exec bash -c ' mv $0 ${0/\-obfuscated/}' {} \; && cd ..
